alert.note: Alert for Citrus; Levy (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 5:59PM EDT until May 11 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Citrus County in west central Florida... Southeastern Levy County in northern Florida... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 558 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Crystal River Airport, or 9 miles west of Beverly Hills, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Inglis, Pine Ridge, Citronelle, Crystal Manor, Crystal River Airport, Homosassa Springs, Homosassa, Black Diamond, and Citrus Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
